name: data4health
description: Facilitate the access, pre-processing, and aggregation of health data at customized spatiotemporal resolutions.

name: clim4health
description: Post-processing climate data harmonized to the spatiotemporal aggregation of health data.

name: land4health
description: Calculate and extract remote sensing metrics for spatial health analysis to obtain areal or zonal statistics.

name: socio4health
description: Designed to simplify the process of extracting and merging sociodemographic surveys data from different sources.

name: cube4health
description: A data acquisition, processing, and publishing toolkit designed to streamline the integration of health, climate, and drone imagery.
